page.title: 06GARDSON FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My name is Jane Elizabeth Langley. I live in Garsdon. I am the youngest of three children. My Mum's name is Jennifer Ann Langley and my Dad's name is Peter Leslie Langley. My sister, Nicola is 15 years old and my brother Christopher is 14. I am 11 years old. My Father is a long distance lorry driver. My Mother is a school dinner lady at the Primary School at Lea, the same school I attend. Also at the school there is another dinner lady called Mrs Margaret Langley who is my Mum's sister. She is married to Norman Langley who is my Dad's twin brother. They have two sons that also attended Lea School. My Aunt also cleans at the village hall in Charlton.
